698:3: iha hi mudrānvayavibhrāntyā mūḍhamanaso bhramanti bhavārṇave duḥkhitāḥ |
698:4: teṣāṃ sukhena caturmudrārthapratipattaye tanrānusāreṇa mahāsukhasādhanaṃ prasādhyate |
698:10: karmma yā kāyavāk cittacintā tatpradhānā mudrā kalpanāsvarūpā,
698:11: tasyāṃ karmmamudrāyāṃ ānandā jāyante kṣaṇabhedena bheditāḥ -
698:18: iti yaduktaṃ tat saṅgataṃ na bhavati |
698:29: yasyāḥ sahajaṃ nāma svarūpaṃ sarvvadharmmānāmakṛtrimalakṣaṇaṃ iti yāvat |
698:32: sādṛśyaṃ yathā darpaṇārpitaṃ mukhasya pratibimbaṃ mukhaṃ na bhavati |
698:33: na pūrvvasiddhaṃ nāpyadhunāsiddhaṃ tadeva mukhapratibimbaṃ sādṛśyamātramāpādayati tathāpi lokāḥ svamukhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā bhrāntyā santuṣṭā bhavanti |
698:34: tathaivācāryyāḥ kumatadāḥ prajñājñānamāsādya sahajamanubhūtaṃ iti kṛtvā santoṣaṃ utpādayanti,
698:35: santuṣṭāśca santo dharmmamudrāyā vārttāmapi na jānanti |
698:36: dharmmamudrāmajānānā kevalayā karmmamudrayā kṛtrimayā kathamakṛtrimabhūtaṃ sahajākhyaṃ utpadyate |
698:37: sajātīyāt kāraṇāt sajātīyasya eva kāryyasya utpattirbhavati na tu vijātīyāt yathā śālībījāt śālyaṅkurotpattirbhavati natu kodravyasya |
698:38: tathā dharmmamudrāyā akṛtrimāyāḥ sakāśāt akṛtrimaṃ sahajaṃ utpadyate |
698:46: tat svacchamāsthānaṃ volakakkolarasasaṃyogena avadhṛtyā samvṛtibodhicittamaṇyantargataṃ yadā bhavet tadā kṣaṇikanāmā parasahajākhyaṃ jñānamutpadyate |
698:48: tatsvarūpeṇa prajñājñānānandatrayaḥ kṣaṇacatuṣṭayānvitaṃ mekaṃ haṭhayoge ca karmmamudrāyā niṣpandaphalamuktam |
698:50: om-dharmmamudrā dharmmadhātusvarūpā niṣprapañcā nirvvikalpā akṛtrimā utpādarahitā karuṇāsvabhāvā paramā nandaikasundaropāyabhūtā |
698:51: pravāhanityatvena sahajasvabhāvā yā prajñāyāḥ sahajodayatvena abhinnā yā sā dharma mudretyabhidhīyate |
698:52: anyat lakṣaṇaṃ tasyāḥ saṅkulājñānāndhakāre taraṇikiraṇasadṛśaṃ gurūpadeśataḥ tṛṇatu[ṣa]samā tatrāpi bhrāntiśalyavarjjitaṃ bodhyavyam |
698:58: mārgajñāne sādaranirantaraṃ mārgābhyāsāt nirodhasya sahajasvabhāvasya sākṣātkṛtitvaṃ bhavati |
698:60: nāpaneyaṃ ataḥ kiñcit prakṣeptavyaṃ na kiñcana |
698:62: lalanā rasanā tayormadhyadeśe nivāsinī avadhūtī saivādhigatasakalapadārthasahajasvabhāvaikacittavṛtteḥ sadgurūpadeśato dharmmamudrā mahāmudrāyā abhedena hetubhūtā |
698:66: mahāmudrā niḥsvabhāvā jñeyādyāvaraṇavivarjjitā śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganasaṅkāśā sakalasampadādhārabhūtā bhavanirvvāṇaikasvarūpā anālambanakaruṇāśarīrā mahāsukhaikarūpā |
698:67: tathā ca,amanasikārā dharmmā kuśalā manasikārā dharmmā akuśalā pravacane ca |
698:73: hū-samayamudreti sambhoganirmmāṇakāyākārasvabhāvena svacchākāreṇa ca sattvārthāya vajradharasya herukākāreṇa visphuraṇaṃ yat sā samayamudreti copadiśyate |
698:74: tāṃ ca samayamudrāṃ gṛhītvā cakrākāreṇa pañcavidhaṃ jñānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ parikalpya ādarśa-samatā-pratyavekṣaṇā-kṛtyānuṣṭhāna-suviśuddha-dharmmadhātubhiḥ ādiyoga-maṇḍalarājāśri-karmmarājāśri-binduyoga-sūkṣmayogaiḥ samayamudrācakraṃ bhāvayantyācāryyāḥ |
698:78: tasmāt sahajasiddharasāt na bedhena sthiracalādayo yena vā bālaparikalpitā te saṃbodhikā[raṇa]tāmupayānti |
698:79: na mantrajāpo na tapo na homo
698:80: na māṇḍaleyaṃ na ca maṇḍalaṃ ca |
698:81: sa mantrajāpaḥ sa tapaḥ sa homaḥ
698:84: samāsataḥ sarvvadharmmāṇāmekākārato yadut mahāsukhākārataḥ cittamitibodhicittaṃ samājarūpīti |
